name: Lunar Escape 2600
description:
Lunar Escape 2600 is a throwback to the early 1980's when the Atari was king and Nintendo were only just beginning to plot their dominance.

Created in the spirit of the times Lunar Escapes has you playing a stranded astronaut who needs to collect fuel for his rocket ship. The only problem is the fuel is deep inside a cave and everything and I mean everything wants to kill him.

Patience, reflexes and timing are required to navigate the 20 levels… do you accept the challenge?

  • Game fully supports USB game controllers as well as keyboard.
  • Play in windowed or full screen.
